title: Table of values of derivative, no context part - a

content.description: Let f be a function that is twice differentiable for all real numbers. The table above gives values of f for selected points in the closed interval 2 ≤ x ≤ 13.
content.question: Estimate f ′(4). Show the work that leads to your answer.

frqParts.text: Estimate f ′(4). Show the work that leads to your answer.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
